name: DarbotBrowserAutomation
description: Example Copilot Studio workflow using Darbot Browser MCP connector

triggers.name: When a user asks about website automation
triggers.description: Triggered when user mentions website, browser, or automation tasks

actions.name: Wait for Page Load
actions.description: Wait 3 seconds for page to fully load

actions.name: Capture Screenshot
actions.description: Take a screenshot of the loaded page

actions.name: Get Page Content
actions.description: Get structured content of the page

actions.name: Save as Work Profile
actions.description: Save current browser state as a work profile

responses.content:
I've successfully navigated to @{triggerBody()['text_url']} and captured the page information. Here's what I found:

**Page Title:** @{body('get_page_snapshot')['result']['title']}
**Current URL:** @{body('get_page_snapshot')['result']['url']}

I've also taken a screenshot and saved this as a work profile named '@{body('save_work_profile')['result']['name']}' for future reference.

**Page Content Summary:**
@{substring(body('get_page_snapshot')['result']['snapshot'], 0, 500)}...

Would you like me to interact with any specific elements on this page?

examples.userInput: Navigate to google.com and take a screenshot
examples.expectedBehavior: The bot will navigate to Google, wait for the page to load, capture a screenshot, get the page content, and save it as a work profile for future use.

examples.userInput: Go to wikipedia.org and show me what's on the page
examples.expectedBehavior: The bot will navigate to Wikipedia, capture the page structure, and provide a summary of the page content including title and main elements.

advanced_examples.name: Form Filling Workflow
advanced_examples.description: A more complex workflow that fills out a web form

steps.notes: Requires element reference from page snapshot

advanced_examples.name: Work Profile Management
advanced_examples.description: Workflow for managing different work contexts

navigation_failure.response: I'm sorry, I couldn't navigate to that website. Please check the URL and try again, or let me know if you'd like help with a different site.

timeout_error.response: The page is taking longer than expected to load. Would you like me to try again or proceed with a different task?

authentication_error.response: There seems to be an authentication issue with the browser automation service. Please contact your administrator to check the connector configuration.

user_prompts: Always ask for confirmation before performing destructive actions
Provide clear feedback about what actions are being performed
Offer to save important browser states as work profiles
Suggest relevant follow-up actions based on page content
performance: Use wait conditions instead of fixed delays when possible
Take screenshots sparingly to avoid large data transfers
Reuse work profiles for frequently accessed sites
Handle errors gracefully with helpful suggestions
